title.value: Improving Generalization in Task-oriented Dialogues with Workflows and Action Plans
title.justification: This is the concise title of the paper provided in the document.
title.quote: Improving Generalization in Task-oriented Dialogues with Workflows and Action Plans

extractions.description: This paper focuses on enhancing the robustness of task-oriented dialogue agents by augmenting them with workflow names and action plans. Specifically, the paper illustrates the utilization of text2text transformers like T5-small, base, and large to improve the models' ability to generalize to unseen workflows and actions. Extensive experiments are conducted using the Action-Based Conversations Dataset (ABCD).

type.justification: The article primarily describes experiments and results based on applying various models to a specific dataset to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.
type.quote: We perform extensive experiments on the Action-Based Conversations Dataset (ABCD) with T5-small, base and large models.

name.justification: The main focus of the paper is on dialogue systems, which falls under Natural Language Processing (NLP).
name.quote: We hypothesize that performance on task-oriented dialogue can be improved by augmenting language models with prompts.

name.justification: The paper concentrates on task-oriented dialogue systems, which is a specific domain within NLP.
name.quote: Task-oriented dialogue is difficult in part because it involves understanding user intent, collecting information from the user, executing API calls, and generating helpful and fluent responses.

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of T5-small as one of the models for experiments.
name.quote: We perform extensive experiments on the Action-Based Conversations Dataset (ABCD) with T5-small, base and large models.

is_contributed.justification: The T5-small model was used for the experiments, but it is not introduced or contributed by this paper.
is_contributed.quote: We perform extensive experiments on the Action-Based Conversations Dataset (ABCD) with T5-small, base and large models.

is_executed.justification: The model was implemented and experimented upon during the study.

is_compared.justification: The paper compares the performance of T5-small with other models like T5-base and T5-large.
is_compared.quote: We perform extensive experiments on the Action-Based Conversations Dataset (ABCD) with T5-small, base and large models.
